<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<P>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=100%>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=100%>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<P>



<DIV CLASS="main">

<SPAN ClASS="regtxt">

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<P>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

</script>
<!-- end banner ad trigger -->



</BODY>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<P> <SPAN CLASS="menutitle">EverQuest Lore</SPAN><BR>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td valign="top" bgcolor=#CED2E3>
<font size=2 face="verdana"><b>Comment:</b></font>
</td>
<td valign="top" bgcolor=#CED2E3>
<textarea name="comment" rows="5" cols="50"></textarea>
</td>
</tr>
<td colspan=2 valign="top" bgcolor=#C0C0C0><center>
<input type="hidden" name="newsID" value="964134141,81151,"><!--ktalk format 1-->

</center>
</td>
</table>
</form>
</center>
<P>
</div>


</SPAN>
</p>

<BR><BR><BR></DIV></TD>

</TD>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=100%>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<P>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

</MAP>

<TD VALIGN=TOP WIDTH=100%>

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->

<P>



<DIV CLASS="main">

<SPAN ClASS="regtxt">

<!-- BEGIN BANNER -->

<TABLE ALIGN=CENTER><TR><TD>

<script language="JavaScript">
<!-- Hide from non-JavaScript compatible browsers

// Banner Ad Tag Script
hasLayers = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4.02 && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) < 5);
hasIframes = (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 4) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 5);
obeysNoscript = (navigator.appName.substring(0,8) == "Netscape" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 3) || (navigator.appName.substring(0,9) == "Microsoft" && parseFloat(navigator.appVersion) >= 2) || navigator.appName.substring(0,5) == "WebTV";
OPERA = (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('Opera') != -1);



function addTag(target,tagid) {

now = new Date();
random = now.getTime();


if (hasLayers && obeysNoscript) {
document.write('<ilayer ID=');
document.write(tagid);
document.writeln(' visibility=hide width=468 height=60></ilayer>');

} else {
if (hasIframes && obeysNoscript) {
document.writeln('<iframe src="http://adserver.ign.com/html-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" name=topad width=468 height=60 frameborder=0 border=0 marginwidth=0 marginheight=0 scrolling=no align=top>')
document.writeln('</iframe>')
} else {
if ((obeysNoscript && !hasLayers && !hasIframes) || OPERA) {
document.writeln('<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" target="_new">')
document.writeln('<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/' + target + '?' + random + '" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>')
}
}
}

}

// end of Banner Ad Tag Script


// end JavaScript Hide -->
</script>



<!-- RPG genre banner ad -->
<script language="JavaScript">
<!--
addTag('size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc','j1');
// -->
</script>

<noscript>
<a href="http://adserver.ign.com/click-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" target="_new">
<img src="http://adserver.ign.com/image-ng/size=468x60&genre=rpg&network=ign&category=pc&site=pc" width=468 height=60 border=0 alt="banner ad"></a>
</noscript>
<!-- end RPG genre banner ad -->
</TD></TR></TABLE>

<!-- END BANNER -->
